attributes.action: close down unsafe underpasses and create safe alternatives
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After hearing about the attack of Patricia Thomson we are outraged and upset about the lack of safety on the streets of Wester Hailes and the surrounding area. It is clear it is not fit for purpose and there needs to be an alternative.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with your local authority.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
